TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 172
TEI.2.document_title: George Orr to Stephen F Austin, 02-18-1829

barker_notes.barker_summary: George Orr to Austin, February 18, 1829. Thanking Austin for influence in obtaining grants of land for settlers on the Trinity.
barker_notes.barker_footnotes: On the subject of this letter see Austin to Anastaeio Bustamante, Mar, 4, 1828.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 172

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*George Orr to Austin, February 18, 1829. Thanking Austin for influence in obtaining grants of land for settlers on the Trinity.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Trinaty Atoscosito*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="02-18-1829">Fabery 18—. 1829*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*To *person_mentioned*Cornal S F Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dear Sir I Received your Leater by the hand of *person_mentioned*Mr E. M. Williamson*/person_mentioned*- *date_mentioned n="02-17-1829">yeasterday */date_mentioned*which Give Me Greate Setisfaction I Likewise Received jout Leater Dated the *date_mentioned n="12-31-1828">31st Desamber Last*/date_mentioned* Togather with the Official Leater and its Translation from the *person_mentioned*Chief of the Department of *location_mentioned*Bexer*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* which was Grate Satisfaction To hear the Good Tidings that thrue your feling and Kind Gratitud that you have persevered in obtaining a *location_mentioned*Grant */location_mentioned*for the Lands in this *location_mentioned*Sacsion */location_mentioned*of Contra from the honarable Governmant and i think the *person_mentioned*Setters *location_mentioned*on this River*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* Should never for Get you as their faithfull freind and My Salf amongst the reast and i am in hopes that we will Soon be Satisfied as Regerds our Lands or the Leand that whe Expect To Get*/p*
*p*I Should Take it as a Grate favour if you wood Leat Me Know whan the *person_mentioned*Comisionar Padilla*/person_mentioned* Should arive in *person_mentioned*St antone */person_mentioned*I and Some of the *person_mentioned*nabours */person_mentioned*will Go and Se him if poseble i wood do anay thing in My power to forward the Buisness or Expodit the Saim So that the *person_mentioned*inhabitants */person_mentioned*May be Satisfied i think it wood Make a grate difrens in this *location_mentioned*Saction */location_mentioned*of Contra*/p*
*p*I wish To Com out To Se you in 2 or 3 weks if poseble*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*George Orr*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*Pleais To Give My Complimants To *person_mentioned*Mr Samual M Williams*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
